page.title: 09Auchtydonald Farm
page.content: {Auchtydonald farm}comprises{450}acres or{189}hectares.The{farm}has been in the{Davidson family}for{85}years.Mr Davidson is the third generation to manage the farm.He grows alot of crops including barley,wheat,potatoes,soft fruit and Christmas trees but recently has endeavoured to grow protein peas, turnips and one of the most recent additions,oil seed rape which colours the fields a vivid yellow.He also raises Friesian bulls for beef.These are processed in{Turriff}and sold prepacked to supermarkets in{England. All his waste potatoes,grass,turnips and barley are eaten by the cattle.His {farm}accountancy is not computerised.
